thread.section_title: Current Analysis Reports - Business Technology and Software
thread.title: With New DNS Malware Analytics, HP Targets ‘Talking’ Malware
thread.title_full: With New DNS Malware Analytics, HP Targets ‘Talking’ Malware

author: Parizo, Eric
title: With New DNS Malware Analytics, HP Targets ‘Talking’ Malware
text: September 04, 2015 Rate this report Intelligence Alert HP’s new DNS Malware Analytics, which teams with ArcSight to spot malware contacting known bad or suspicious external domains, is not only a shot across Cisco’s bow, but also represents the beginning of HP Enterprise Security’s move to the cloud.
